Action.author: arman19940326
Action.body: For anyone having this issue, I was able to solve this problem by setting the environment variable CORE_PEER_GOSSIP_ENDPOINT to domain name :7051. For example, in case of adding peer2-org1-example-com to the channel set this env to peer2-org1-example-com:7051
